faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform

setup.question: How quickly can I set up my digital menu?
setup.answer: You can have your digital menu ready in under 30 minutes. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to add dishes, set prices, and configure allergen information.

technical.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use this platform?
technical.answer: Not at all! Our platform is designed for restaurant owners, not developers. Everything is point-and-click with helpful guides along the way.

orders.question: Can customers place orders directly through the menu?
orders.answer: Yes! Customers can browse your menu, customize their orders, and pay directly through the platform. You'll receive orders instantly on your dashboard.

qrCodes.question: How do the QR codes work?
qrCodes.answer: We generate unique QR codes for your restaurant that customers can scan with their phones. This instantly opens your digital menu in their browser - no app required!

payments.question: What payment methods do you support?
payments.answer: We support all major credit cards, digital wallets, and local payment methods through our secure Stripe integration.

realtime.question: Can I update my menu in real-time?
realtime.answer: Absolutely! Any changes you make are instantly reflected on all customer devices. Perfect for daily specials or sold-out items.
